subtitle: A traditional accompaniment to roast turkey at Christmas.

method.text: Stretch the bacon rashers on a board with the back of a knife. Cut in half widthways. Wrap each piece of bacon around a sausage.
Add the sausages to the roasting tin with the turkey 30 min before the end of cooking time. Cook until lightly browned.
Remove from the roasting tin. Keep warm while the turkey is 'resting'. Serve with the turkey.

title: Sausages wrapped in bacon
